title: FYI: TripleByte is emailing old referrals
author: wilde
story_text: I referred a friend to TripleByte in 2017 back when I was actually using the service. He received an email a couple of days ago claiming I referred him again. I've submitted an account deletion request so my friends stop getting spammed but figured I'd let you all know.

title.value: FYI: TripleByte is emailing old referrals
